content: Good morning. We configured a FHIR server on site to start to with this technology. We want add security to login it. Its possible to configure the server using Oauth2. Anybody has any steps list to do it?. Thank you

Good morning. We configured a FHIR server on site to start to with this technology. We want add security to login it. Its possible to configure the server using Oauth2. Anybody has any steps list to do it?. Thank you

I can see that the server is not configured. The oauth2 protocol is used to obtain the information from the server, right?
OAuth2 is a common protocol for access, but it's not the only possible one. Which FHIR server are you using?
@Juan Antonio De los Cobos I am interested in this too.
